message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You got a better offer, don't be greedy!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't get too excited!
You're getting desperate, I can sense it!
I'm not desperate, but I'll give you a slightly better deal. This is my last good offer!
You're getting closer to leaving with nothing!
I'm not going to give up yet! I'll give you a slightly better deal, but this is my final offer!
You're really going to leave with nothing?!
I'm not going to give up yet! This is my final offer, take it or leave it!
You're really going to leave with $1000?!
I'm not going to accept this ridiculous offer. I'll leave with nothing rather than accept this insult.
